response.overview: Died in a car crash, Paolo is allowed to come back to life for 92 minutes more, thanks to a miscalculation made by Heavenly accountants. He decides to use this newfound time on Earth to fix his mistakes as a father and husband.
response.title: Ordinary Happiness

titles.title: La alegría de las pequeñas cosas
开心与难过微不足道的时刻
